name: Wolf in Ohio
description:
Wolf in Ohio

Wolf in Ohio is a 3D survival game. You will play as a hungry wolf stuck in the lands of Ohio who is struggling to get to Michigan. The player will have to achieve every type of goal in each level to help the wolf survive. While playing, the wolf must avoid dogs on patrol and skin the sheep to keep itself fed, with a disguise as its reward. This game is most suited to ages 16 and up and those who enjoy survival games.
